dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Video image. WAJ is 20, a British Pakistani, built like a fridge. He wears camos, a black headscarf & behind him a rug is pinned to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: No, sit properly like you’re gonna mean it - like you mean it. No, Waj, don’t muck about cos the battery’s gonna go. Sit...

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Who’s mucking about? but I’m not mucking about.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Well you can’t sit like that. Above shot lasts about a second then we see Omar and Barr are looking at this on the monitor screen of the camera. Barry is filming.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What’s wrong with how he’s sitting Barry?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Come and have a look, it’s wrong.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: There’s nothing wrong with it. WAJ gets up to see what he looks like in the camera.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Not you. No. Right what you looking at?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: There’s nothing there.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: No there’s nothing there. Now, go and sit down. You can’t see yourself now can you.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: I thought you were recording it!

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Now sit, sit. Fessal go away.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: I'm ready, i’m ready.  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Alright, Waj just relax your face. Now focus on what you’re going to say

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: We've got to go before the battery goes.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: One, two, three, action. Video image... WAJ. He is a proud mujahid - holding his g An AK47. Half size. Plastic. Toy. He stares at the lens, pumps himself a face, holds it, looks off...

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Ayup you unbelieving kuffar bastards - I'm gonna turn ya baked beanz! - what? He has been put off by something Barry is doing.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What’s with the gun?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Hey it’s proper replica man.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What for - action man?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Replica AK47.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: It’s too small, man.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: It’s not too small brother. That’s just me hands. Big hands, brother. (looks to Omar)

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Shut up, Barry. Try it without our kid and let’s go.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: It’s too small, believe me.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: (beat) I’1l bigger it. I'll hold it nearer the camera that'll bigger it. Waj proffers the feeble unit & his hand enlarges with the lens.  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Ayup you unbelieving kuffar bastards.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: No,no, this is stupid, this is absolutely stupid.... INT. OMAR & SOPHIA’S HOUSE. DAY. *k

dialogues.speaker: OMAR IS GLANCING AT SOPHIA AS THEY WATCH, LOOKING A BIT
dialogues.text: WORRIED - IS THIS OK? IT’S NOT OK ... HE’S EMBARRASSED.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: These are the outtakes - the bloopers

dialogues.speaker: SOPHIA
dialogues.text: He looks good (indicating Omar on sceren).

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Today is a wake up call. Today is an opportunity for you to look in the mirror at your western...

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: imperialist culture, superficial materialism ends at the capitalist church of McDonald's.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Flippin idiots Omar watching the video winces

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: It’s as though you’ve just had a big mac, completely oblivious to the amount...

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Complete flippin idiots. You could have gone Chicken Cottage, proper halal, bargain bucket
4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Talking about Chicken Cottage... OMAR CAN’T HIDE THIS NONSENSE FROM SOFIA - WHO IS LOOKING LIKE SHE WANTS TO SUPPORT THE PROJECT BUT CAN’T FIND A

dialogues.speaker: OMAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dah! There’s another one where he doesn’t say that.

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: (OMAR‘S 8 YEAR OLD SON) Your bit’s good Dad.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR IS CONFLICTED
dialogues.text: SCREEN. NOW THERE’S A VIDEO OF FESSAL WITH A BOX ON HIS HEAD.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Take the box off.

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: I cant show my face because it’s an image. An image is a haram.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR.
dialogues.text: You know what, they’re all bloopers. What am I going to do if he does that at the camp? (turns to Mahmood) Mahmood, do you think Uncle Fessal’s ready to go to Pakistan?

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: No way. curt TO INT. SECURITY CONTROL ROOM. NIGHT. *k We see OMAR and MATT are in front of the bank of TV screens. Security men, staring at the boring footage, looking bored. Omar is deep in thought - can’t believe ho boring this all is.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: (after a long beat) I ran 23k on the weekend. 6k Saturday morning. Had a light lunch. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 MATT (cont'd) Snack a jacks and a medium apple. 5k in the afternoon. ‘Cos obviously it was after lunch, so. Then same again on Sunday. Although in the afternoon I only did 4k cos I'd had a roast. I would have gone further y’know but I started to run a bit lopsided. Yeah, I’m not slagging my right leg off, but my left leg's definitely stronger. Matt stretches the other leg. Omar is bored shitless - looking at his laptop, occasionally registering fake sign of listening. Suddenly something on the screen takes his attention. In an email window - a message from Uncle P - reads simply “wedding list full - last chance!!”

dialogues.speaker: MATT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I think lefty just wants it more. Righty’s bone idle, he just waits there let’s lefty to pick up the slack - then before you know it you're running in curves - I’m going to have to put my foot down you know, really show him who's boss, you know what I mean? You can talk to your legs you know.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (makes a decision) I need tomorrow off.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: I need tomorrow off and the two weeks after that.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Jesus. I thought you were serious about this job Omar?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: I’ve got to go to a wedding in Pakistan.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: You've got to ask yourself where you'll be in five years time?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: It’s an emergency.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: What an emergency wedding? Like, a shotgun wedding?  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Like a shotgun wedding, yeah.

dialogues.speaker: MATT
dialogues.text: Well, I’1l have a look at the rota.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: The Feds can track your phone even if the battery’s out. Really. They can see you underground right...

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Can they see you if you’re not there?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Where’s there?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: I don’t know.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: They can see you everywhere, Waj.

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Are they looking at us through cameras?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Space cameras, yes

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: But me dad says I’m not supposed to be on camera - it’s haram

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: With the greatest of respect Fessal your dad eats newspaper

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Not any more. He eats moths.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Exactly bro - look the way to stop the Feds tracking you is very simple - you eat your simcard. Get your simcards out. Remove your simcard and...  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Can I cook mine?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: No you must eat it raw. Like this

dialogues.speaker: BARRY GOBS HIS SIMCARD
dialogues.text: Salams

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Salam lads

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: We're eating our simcards

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Anti surveillance

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (joking) You know they still work inside you Barry - they can still track them inside you - that’s not going to be very helpful in Pakistan.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Pakistan. I answered the call bro.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What call?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Training camp. We’re upgrading. We're going.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Why d’you get the call? Why didn’t I get the call?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Cos you dont have an Uncle in Pakistan Barry, last time I checked. You've got an uncle in Folkestone. Are there any training camps in Folkestone?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Why do we need training camp anyway? We’re primed! We don’t need some tramp up a mountain telling us to set a fuse. We don’t need some paki Steptoe telling us when to go!  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: You're right Barry. We can go off any time we want.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Exactly, whenever we want, bro.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah, if you want to be some sad loner trenchcoat mafia twazzock.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What I mean is - you can either be some stupid nutter Muslim who blows a bag full of nails into his own guts in the toilets at TGI’s or you can be a proper soldier in the Mujahideen?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: I’m already in the mujahideen.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: No you're not bro. Not until you join the army and hold the sword. Touch the sky. (Barry looks interested) Proper chain of command right to the very top. He points up as if to indicate Allah. Barry thinking hard

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Alright. I’m coming.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Oh you want paki Steptoe now do you?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Listen I am the most Al Qaeda one here.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Think of the group, Barry, think of what we're trying to do, right. It’s best you stay here, Barry. You’re a liability and you’re a loose cannon.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Bollocks I'm a liability. I am the invisible jihadi. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 BARRY (cont'd) They seek him here, they seek him there, but he’s not there cos he’s blowing up your slag sister!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Invisible? Like the time you got on the local news for baking a twin towers cake and leaving it in the synagogue on 9/11.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: That was part of the plan - hide in plain sight you mug. And I am coming. curt TO EXT. BARRY’S CAR / ROAD TO AIRPORT. DAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Omar is next to Barry. Waj is in the back with Fessal. Beady eyes. Barry is driving Omar and Waj to the airport. Suddenly he outbursts.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: You realize if I don't come with you to Pakistan bro Islam is finished!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (soothes ) Listen bro, we need you over here to keep a lid on things.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Sure, so what if I'm not here coz I bought a ticket at the airport and I come with you anyways? Very pleased with this, tetchy Barry depockets his passport. Omar is taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: You wanna come Fess? Fessal is unexpectedly on the spot

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Yeah it’s just me dads seeing creatures that's not there. (this is seriously alarming to Fessal)  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: (to omar re Fessal) So he'll keep it ticking over here bro.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (right) Barry right it you can answer this question you can come. Barry nods assent.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (in Urdu) How's your Urdu you mouse’s minge? Waj and Fessal laugh. Barry knows he is stumped.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Don't fuck with me man. Don't fuck with Azzam al Britani! (himself) Fury rising - Barry slams on the brakes - recklessly - skidding. - pulls in to layby.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: If I'm not going no one is! A beat. Omar looks at the ignition key. Barry whips it ou and shoves it in his gob. Waj grabs Barry’s neck, claws h nose from behind him, & starts reaching into Barry's mout Barry, making stupid gutteral noises, swallows the key.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Its gone down his neck.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (new plan - to Waj ) Right frog him. Frog him in the back bro!

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: (protesting) No, no frogging, we agreed no frogging, you said no frogging.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. LAYBY / INT. BARRY’S CAR. DAY - CONTINUOUS *k Super quick Waj piles out the car. Barry resists until Wa sticks his thumb in his mouth, and walks Barry to the boo of the car. Omar starts to hotwire the car. Barry complie with the frogging physically but protests. 10  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What if you get caught? - I'm not going down just coz you can't take a drill in the knee-cap. They'll crack you like baby's fingers! They'll pump you full of Viagra and make you fuck a dog. Waj opens the boot. Barry leaning in to Waj as he ties Barry up.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Stay still brother Barry.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: You'll end up on you tube - blowing Lassie in a ditch. Waj flips Barry into the car and slams the boot - Omar wi starts the car - Waj clambers back into the back of the c - Omar to drive.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. BARRY’S CAR. DAY - CONTINUOUS *k

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Are they gonna make me fuck a dog out there brother Omar?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (to Waj) Bro. My uncle's connected. Only time we'll see cops is for weapons upgrade! Waj is relieved. Suddenly Barry's head bursts thru the armrest panel in the back seat

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Alright Omar, I’m letting you go to Pakistan. My unit stays here. But my unit’s the main unit.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Barry - shut up mate - because I tell you, your little brain cell might go off now and again but if your hands even go to move - if you start setting up the Islamic state of Tinsley again - going to university lectures opening your big mouth - buying some more silver nitrate from Amazon - I’m going to rip your plugs out. BARRY. Not if you’re not here you won't. 11  10 11 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 With emphatic punctuation Waj slams Barry back into the boot and shuts the armrest on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plane taking off to Pakistan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: High view of crowded Pakistani city. Tracking front view Tuk Tuk drives through the crowded streets of a Pakistani city. New sounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waj and Omar with Uncle X are rammed in a row of three — facing out through the back. Waj is scoffing a samosa. Uncle eyes them judgmentally. Waj is worried.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: (in Punjabi about Waj) Is he as stupid as he looks?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (checks Waj, Punjabi) No uncle.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: (Punjabi) So what ina prostitute's howling trap is this? He pulls out Waj’s prayer reciting teddy bear.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Me prayer bear! He does me prayers. Uncle considers for a moment then shouts through to the driver.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: (Punjabi) Stop! The Tuk Tuk screeches to a sudden halt outside a shop.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 12  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 12 INT. SHOP RAWALPINDI. PAKISTAN.NIGHT. *k In a back room full of junk & stores & caged chickens - U rifles through Omar and Waj’s bags. Chucking contents abo with contempt - Astronaut food, Sports Nutriment, trainer socks, bits of low level camping kit.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: What the fuck’s he going to do with those rabbits bro.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: They're not rabbits bro, they're chickens.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: They're rabbits.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Bro, if they’re rabbits, where are their ears?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: That's what I’m saying. Uncle X brandishes an Islam for kids learning book from o of the rucksack.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: (Punjabi) Would you kill him?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: (Punjabi) He’s an idiot - would you kill him? Omar is gobsmacked.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: What's he saying?

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: (sudden English) I'm asking would he kill you?! The boys stare at each other - specially Waj.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: Pack up. If you make me trouble (Punjabi) I'll stitch your gobs to the fucking shit pipe. He goes to leave.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE X
dialogues.text: Salam aleykum. 13  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: WAJ/OMAR
dialogues.text: Wa-likumasalaam. Uncle X leaves. Omar exhales in relief.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: (beat) Would you kill me then? They start to reload their bags. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (protects him) No - course not.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: (relief causing joke) I'd kill you bro.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (half amused) Would you?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (what he really thinks) Right good coz I would kill you bro. Bro, seriously I'd kill you, course I would! - I'd kill you like that (clicks fingers)

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Flippin heck man would ya?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah course.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Right, I sort of thought I were jokin’ a bit there bro.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: We're soldiers bro - whatever's asked - you do it - you do the right thing. Right, you with me? It’s life innit, it’s just life. What is that? Its nothing. It’s like being stuck in the queue at Alton Towers. Do you want be in the queues or do you want to be on the rides. You want to be on the rides dont you? You want to be on Nemesis or Oblivion.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: (getting it, remembering) Rubber Dingy Rapids. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 14  13 4 LIONS SCRIPT at WAJ (cont'd) Yeah, rubber dingy rapids! - OK I would kill ya brother Omar! I'd smash your head off with a thing.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Do you know what I'd do Waj. I'd grab one of these hooks and I’d dig it in your belly, I'd rip your guts out and spill them all out like Mortal Combat.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: I'd take this right and I'd fucking run you over with a tractor.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah? Soldiers brother. Mujahid.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Ha ha! Soldiers man! Mujahid! Exhilarated, they high five and embrace.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Come on

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Yeah come on, do you want some rabbit, you fucked up rabbit with 31.10.09 no ears.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Waj, they’re chickens.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. CAR / ROUGH ROAD. PAKISTAN. JUST BEFORE DAWN.
dialogues.text: Car 4x4 side/headlights speeds through barren landscape. Omar awake and Waj asleep on him as the car rumbles along Car bounces through scrub near encampment - stops. The driver opens the door & hauls Omar & Waj out and goes rou to the back of the car. Their bags arrive rudely through the air - driver jumps back into car and leaves them ther Alone in a big space. From 50 metres away - a voice

dialogues.speaker: KHALID
dialogues.text: (Arabic) Hurry up - morning prayers (English) You are late.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 15  14 15 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 EXT. TRAINING ENCAMPMENT. PAKISTAN. DAWN. *k They hurry over to the encampment - some camo'd tents - a shed and a vehicle - where a bunch of mujahadeen trainees are assembling for prayer.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. TRAINING ENCAMPMENT PRAYER AREA. PAKISTAN. DAY. *k Waj is unrolling his prayer mat - but the guy next to him has a big problem with it

dialogues.speaker: PAKISTANI MUJ
dialogues.text: (furious punjabi) Turn around, Mecca is over there. Waj is puzzled - his prayer mat is facing the rising sun. This guy is forcing him to spin 180 degrees in the opposi direction.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Fuck off bro, east is that way. Omar alerted from his prayer preparations.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Waj we've flown over Mecca now. We've gone past Mecca?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: (explaining as if to a child) Mecca’s in the east yeah? (enunciates slowly) where the (points, mimes a sphere) sun - the sun yeah? Where it rises you behn choad paki prong Khalid is cross & suddenly there. Waj looks massively massively puzzled. Khalid is not impressed. The moment is broken by a noise from the sky. dialogues.text: Omar. He’s loaded. His dad's loaded!

dialogues.text: What from MI5 payroll?

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Nah. He’s got a clothes factory. I can get you a van. I can nick a van ..

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (disgust) You'd steal off your own dad would you?!

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: (beat - realises the right answer) Well, yeah, yeah.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Right. Well you're still walking. Hassan can't believe it. Omar goes up close to him.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Listen next time I see you you better have a fucking van or I'm going to floss your balls with razor wire. Hassan knows he really does have to walk. The others get Waj grins, shuts the door. Barry looks at Hassan as if to ‘played that wrong’, or actually says

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: You played that wrong, mate. And gets in the car. INT. BARRY’S CAR / EXT. AIRPORT - CAR PARK. DAY. *k The conversation continues in static car with Hassan left standing gormlessly unsure what to do, outside the car.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: You're on one Omar.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Drive. The car won’t start.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Did you fix this Barry? 34  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah I fixed it.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What did you do it yourself or something?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Yes I did it myself. Barry pulls off - Omar briefly catching Hassan’s eye to give him false hope before car drives off, then looking a him like he’s shit & filming it on Hassan’s camera phone.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: So is he in or what?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Course he’s in Barry. It’s either that or kill him. What choice do I have?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Great. I knew you’d like him.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 28 INT. MAHMOOD’S BEDROOM. NIGHT. *k Omar is reading a bedtime story to Mahmood, tucked up in bed (no book - he’s making it up).

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: So, Simba and Pumba were out on their own — and Scar was out looking for them — and if he found them — he’d kill them, but

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: Dad?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: Did you blow up any kuffars?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: At the wedding?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Do you want to hear what happened to Simba or not? 35  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Right, so Simba & Pumba were out on their own when all of a sudden they saw this big evil bird that Scar had sent out to look for them! and Simba goes ‘look, there it is!’ — the big evil vulture coming right at them! (pauses — lost in thought)

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: And then what dad?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Well Simba had to bring it down or otherwise it would kill them — so he grabbed a stone and chucked it at the bird only he chucked it so hard, it was such a strong powerful throw that his arm went all the way round and the stone went right behind him — he threw it so hard it went a mile behind him — and it — hit Mufasa — wise strong Mufasa, Simba’s dad — it hit him accidentally on the head and killed him.

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: But didn’t Scar kill Mufasa?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah, in the film - but this is real life I’m talking about? So Simba had a choice. He could either tell all his friends what had happened and agree a confusion or he could keep it a secret and lead all his friends in a big fight against Scar. What do you think he did?

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: He had to tell the truth?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (bit impatient) But he’s got to fight Scar, hasn’t he? Telling the truth means giving up. Would Simba give up?

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: Simba would never give up. 36  29 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Exactly. Exactly. So Simba kept it all a secret. And he lead Pumba and Timon and all his friends, he lead them all ina fight against Scar and they vanquished Scar and Simba became the new lion king

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Bedtime for you, soldier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Omar is stood addressing Barry, Waj, Hassan and Fessal wh are all sat before him in a line. The scene starts with Omar giving a significant look to Barry. Omar is going to straight drop a wopper.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Alright, lads this is it. This is it boys. I’ve spoken to the emir.

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: How did you do that?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Email drop box. And the children’s instant messaging site, Party Puffin.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: I’ve been on that.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Good Waj.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Proper good.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Do we have to be puffins as well?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah I’1l give you all usernames and passwords after this meeting.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: I’m not sure I wanna be a puffin. 37  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: You don’t have to be if you don’t want to Barry.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Bagsy a blue one yeah.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Good Waj. Now I’ve spoken to him. My puffin has communicated with his puffin. He’s told us to get on with it, take Fessal’s gear to the secret flat, we’ll hide it under the costumes in Hassan’s van, we'll put the bleach on boil. We have instructions to bring havoc to this bullshit, consumerist, godless, paki bashing, Gordon Ramsay, Taste the Difference Speciality Cheddar torture endorsing, massacre sponsoring - look at me dancing pissed with me nob out - Sky One Uncovered who gives a fuck about dead Afghanis Disneyland!

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: Musallah. Brother Omar.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Fuck mini baby bells.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (sinks in) Puffin says find a target.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: We've got a target bro we’re all agreed.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: It’s the mosque. Fessal looks doubtful Hassan nods.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah - bomb the mosque. Radicalize the moderates. Bring it all on. 38  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 Fessal looks too scared to challenge. Hassan nods, eyes blazing - Omar realizes this is serious starts pacing. He having trouble taking this in. Barry enjoys this.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: OK. Right. No I like that. I do like that. It’s brilliant. Let's take out a bunch of Muslims - coz they're the real enemy aren't they, Barry? Once we’ve done that why don’t we truck bomb a kebab shop or fly a jumbo into Waj’s mum’s head - why don’t we get a pig and staplegun it to our foreheads? Barry looks stunned. Hassan very taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: But if we bomb a mosque it'll make all the Muslims rise up!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Me cousin Faz died defending a mosque in Bosnia - did he flippin rise up, bro? Hassan is silenced, Fessal pipes up.

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Lets bomb Boots - Beat, group reaction taking this in. FESSAL CONT’D (explaining) They sell condoms that make you wanna bang white girls.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: I second that, Boots. They nabbed me nicking Lynx display.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (disappointed) Right lads, think a bit bigger than a chemist right- I’m not blowing me guts out over a bunch of tampons and cotton buds. What we’ve got to do has got to last in history. Echo through the ages.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: (after a long beat) Like bomb a mosque. 39  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (losing his patience) Barry. We are not bombing a mosque.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: You don't get it do you Omar? We radicalize the moderates - the ummah rises up, it all kicks off!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: No I do get it - I tell you what its like - it’s like having a fight with someone and they’re punching you in the face right - so what you go and do is you punch yourself in the face. Fessal laughs a bit. Barry tries to explain calmly.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Alright, so I’m having a fight with this fictionary man, and he's not punching me hard enough in the face to make me go mental and win?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Let’s do an experiment Barry. We'll have a fight right now. When you start losing and you're not doing very well - you punch yourself in the face, go mental and start winning. Show em all how it works. Omar goes for Barry - pushing - cuffing.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: I'm not gonna punch meself in the face.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Why not, Barry? You’re the Mulsims you're getting attacked. Go mental, Barry go mental. Show em how it works.(he's enjoying this)

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: I'm not a mosque!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yes you are bro! Bomb the mosque!

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: (can't wait) Go on Baz! Bomb it! 40  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: (half supporting) Show him how it works Azzam!

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Come on man show us!

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Fuck’s sake are you all idiots?! A rising “bomb the mosque” chorus of encouragement from Waj, Hassan and Fessal - Barry is cornered, he suddenly does punch himself in the face - it hurts.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Wow! He bombed the mosque. He’s bombed the mosque. Barry where are the moderates? (makes out he's expecting a spectacular fight back) Wait, the moderates should be coming out now..

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Right if I was a mosque, which I’m not, then there'd be all moderates behind my nose, bursting to come out and rise up. The lads find this funny. Barry’s nose starts to trickle blood.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (points) Ooh, they are bro! Barry, the Suffi Muslim Council’s coming out your nose. Ah, you’ve just wiped them out. You’ve just wiped them out. The lads laugh some more. Fessal instinctively & sweetly hands Barry a hanky - Barry wipes the blood off his nose.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (the others laugh) Do you think we should still bomb the mosque Barry? Barry fumes. Decides to leave.

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Here you are, I’ve got you a jay cloth, brother. 4l  30 31 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 Fessal hands Barry a jay cloth and shockingly Barry suddenly cracks his nose with a headbutt in a confused ac of self-piteous revenge.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. VAN OUTSIDE OMAR’S SECRET FLAT. DAY. *k The van marked “Malik’s Cloth & Costume” is parked up outside the bomb factory. Bleak end terrace next to a motorway. Cars and lorries slish by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the flat we saw earlier. It is becoming the bomb factory. On the floor are several boxes of Fessal’s wine bottles with screw caps filled with bleach. There is also stereo and speakers, and a guitar. Hassan and Waj are dan to some niche beats. Hassan is wearing a rabbit head cost Waj is doing a mock execution on the rabbit. Barry enters

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Turn that off. There’s common areas out there.

dialogues.speaker: HASS
dialogues.text: It’s our cover man. We're a band.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: You're what?

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: We're a band.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Bollocks turn it off. What’s with the chicken? We see Fessal wearing a rubber chicken head with coxcombe head costume emerge from kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: It’s beard protection - from the bleach!

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: He’s the drummer! Waj starts to get into the music, and dances up to Barry.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: The chicken drummer. 42  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Yeah, Barry, who broke the chicken’s beak, yeah, remember?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Yeah, Barry, you broke his beak.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah well I’m sorry but beaks get broken in war, don’t they? We're not about protecting beaks are we, we're about blowing them off. Yeah? Well go and unload the van, I’m not doing all the work.(ushers them out) - Waj, Waj, anti surveillance (shakes head) Lads exit shaking heads feeling foolish. Fessal shakes hi head too.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Not you, mate, you’re still here.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 32 EXT. OMAR'S SECRET FLAT (BOMB FACTORY) / HASSAN’S VAN Hassan and Waj approach the back of the van where Omar is handing out the last three boxes. He clocks Waj and Hassa headshaking.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What you doing?

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Just in case they're taking pictures.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Barry says you come out blurry Omar's face, as Waj stands in front of him, shaking his head.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Now stop it. Stop it. CCTV is video. You’re just going to look like a bunch of Sufis on speed. Next time Barry tells you to do something, don’t.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Omar, Hassan and Waj carrying boxes. To their left, a voi 43  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: You alright?

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: You alright Wasim, yeah? (to Waj) Alright Jason - (to Hassan) Who's this one? Clearly she’s been fed code names for each of them - Hass needs a code name too.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: This is Claude. Claude, this is Alice. She’s got the flat next door.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: Hello Claude. (repeats it like she’s trying it on for size) ‘Claude.’ What’s this? She tries to pull the costume off the top of the box.Omar steps in.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Claude’s a new member of the band.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: (grins at him) I used to be in a band ‘till ... all the birds fell off the roof (trails off) I don’t know if you remember?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Alright then Alice. We’ll see you later. Come on lads, come through. Omar is dragging Hassan away.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: Which one are you?

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Claude.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: Claude. Are you French?

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Yeah. See ya.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 44  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 34 EXT. BARRY’S HOUSE. DAY. ESTABLISHER. *k 35 INT. BARRY’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM. DAY ** Barry is recording his video.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Alright mister newsman, in the newsroom. After three. Three, two, one. Yes, it was us. We have struck you where you least expected it. We have bombed the mosque. Only in the days of the final jihad. Barry is interrupted.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Well, you told us to come round. We've just come through the back, anti-surveillance like you said.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Right, well, I’m doing my tape.

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: But we’re not bombing the mosque.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: We're not bombing the mosque. Omar said we’re not bombing the mosque.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Look, I’m just doing this tape in case the plans change to bomb the mosque.

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Yeah but if they did change isn’t the whole point of it to blame it on the kuffar and not take responsibility for it?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What do you know about it, it’s my idea in the first place, not yours. Now fuck off I’m doing my tape, go on. 45  36 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 OMAR. Hello mate.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: What you’re here as well?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah, what’s going on?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: He said he was going to bomb the mosque.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What? Did you say that Barry?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: No I didn’t.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Did you say that Barry?

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Yeah he did.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What did you say then Barry?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: I said I was going to bomb something else. Fuck off, fuck off out my house. INT. OMAR’S HOUSE - KITCHEN. DAY. OMAR IS WATCHING BARRY’S VIDEO ON HIS COMPUTER. SOFIA GET

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: Salam, Ahmed. Omar, it’s your brother. Come in.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: No it’s OK.

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: Just come in and sit down.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Alright Ahmed. Salam aleykum. OMAR BECKONS HIM IN —- AHMED WON’T ENTER - WONT LOOK AT SOFIA AND SHIELDS HIS EYES FROM THE SIGHT OF HER. 46  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: Salam aleykum Omar. (urdu) Can she leave the room?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Waleykum asalam bro - (beckons in again) Come on!

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: I’m good thanks.

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: Just come in and sit down. I’m not in the same room you can come in.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: You are. The wall has been taken out so you are. AHMED STILL SHIELDING HIMSELF WITH HIS HAND...

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Bro, have you come to drop some fatwas cos we’ve just had the carpet cleaned. AHMED (CONT’D) (Urdu) I need to talk to you about violence - there is violence in this house.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (heard it before) Not in this house bro. A SUDDEN NOISE FROM THE GARDEN.

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOUD OOS
dialogues.text: Freeze or I blow your guts out! THEY SPIN TO SEE MAHMOUD - SUPERSOAKER RAISED AT OMAR —

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (playful ‘jack bauer’) Run and hide little man (urdu dininutive) You got thirty seconds!

dialogues.speaker: EXPECTING THIS AND THRILLED, MAHMOUD LEGS IT BACK TO THE
dialogues.text: GARDEN. AHMED HAS A “TOLD YOU” LOOK ON HIS FACE AS HE PRODUCES A THIRD WATER PISTOL.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: What are you teaching him Omar? 47  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: You lost it bro they're water pistols?! You got 150 quotes from the scholars saying that you cant squirt a water pistol?

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: (urgently - enough!) Omar - there is no justification for what you are planning.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What am I planning, bro?

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: You tell me Omar?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: OK - sure you can handle it bro, well its not a proper plan yet - but what I’m thinking is - inshallah - I’m going to go upstairs, run a hot bath, come back down, make some beans on toast.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: Very funny (Urdu) A joke is a sign of weakness.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Is it bro? Have you got opinions to back that up.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: I have eighteen opinions - all very good ones.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: You know what, it’s not top trumps. Muslims are out there getting pasted out there and you're sitting there going (Pakistani accent) “I've got 60,000 opinions say we must not fight back but instead we must measure our beards with rulers and lock our wives in the cupboard”. (urdu)Is that not a sign of weakness? SERIOUS POINT FROM OMAR - AND SOFIA FULLY AGREES.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: It's not a cupboard it's a small room! 48  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: (rising impatience) Oh come on. It was a flippin toilet til you took the china out!

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: (to Sofia) I don't argue with women.

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: No you dont you lock em ina cupboard.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: (to Omar) Omar your wife is out of control.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: I don’t know how to control her, help me out.

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA'S HAD ENOUGH
dialogues.text: ATTITUDE IS >>OH WELL IF I’M OUT OF CONTROL I’LL BE OUT O

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: Oh I'm so out of control - look at this - what am I doing?

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh stop me Omar what am I like?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: (larfs) Do it again babe he won't fight back... (ironically) In fact I order you! (winks at ahmed) Obey me wife! Go and do it.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ah fighting bro ! fighting

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: (shooting now) I'm not fighting - this is not fighting.

dialogues.speaker: SOPHIA
dialogues.text: No its self defence!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Defend yourself bro - come on - little intifada in the face! 49  37 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 AHMED LEAVES. SQUIRTING AND SHOUTING.

dialogues.speaker: AHMED
dialogues.text: I am not fighting (urdu) this is wrong ! You twisted idiot owls

dialogues.speaker: OMAR LAUGHS HIM OUT OF THE HOUSE. AS THE DOOR IS SHUT
dialogues.text: THEY’RE LEFT LAUGHING AT EACH OTHER - A BEAT - SOFIA SQUIRTS OMAR IN THE FACE - AND HE SQUIRTS HER BACK...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. OMAR’S SECRET FLAT (AKA BOMB FACTORY). NIGHT *k The place is a constructive mess. Bits of bomb making kit abound. White powder dries on paper plates. Tupperware boxes, nuts and bolts, tape & other bomb making kit. THe microwave they will later blow up. In the kitchen several saucepans of bleach are on the boil. The extractor fan is on. Cannister for making dry ice. A baby bath or two - fo the acetone adding stage. And Fessal’s bottles all clutte the surfaces.Omar is at the hob. In the sitting room, Hassan and Waj are taking it in turn to detonate small quantities of TATP on their hands. the feeling is of a jackass escalation. lg 2g etc. This is instantly detectable without having to see each phase played out. Barry is sitting on the floor - absorbed in a construction of bolts and nails in a small tupperware box exquisitely neat.

dialogues.speaker: HASS
dialogues.text: That’s twice as much bro

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: This one’s gonna make a mark! Hass holds hand out in trepidation. Waj ignites the powde with a cooker lighter. Huge flash and puff. They both collapse in shocked thrilled laughter. Fessal is filming this on Hassan’s camera and turns his attention to Barry

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Jew, gay, fed, Sodomite, Gynaecologist, innocent bloke - doesn’t exist - Leonard Cohen. Here you give me that. You do some work. While doing this Barry looks up at Fessal. He takes the camera and turns it on Fessal who hurriedly puts a box on his head. Hass has finished packing the cannister. Waj is gorming with excitement 50  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: HASS
dialogues.text: This one’s going to be like a grenade. Watch this bro! Barry swings the camera over to Hassan who raises the cannister. He hurls the cannister onto the floor. BOOOOOOM!!! Stunned lull... then post stunned jackass hilarity. Omar pops thru from the kitchen - half delighted but also annoyed

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Come on lads. Why don’t you just pick up the phones and call the cops? Come on.

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Sorry man. Omar pops back in. Fessal -peeping out from his box is worried

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Barry - we don’t have do use that on ourselves do we Barry?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Course we do, bro.

dialogues.speaker: FESSAL
dialogues.text: Yeah but its our choice right? Omar pops back in to leave no doubt

dialogues.speaker: OMAR

dialogues.text: Come here. You were much more fun when you were going to blow yourself up, love.

dialogues.text: I am going to blow myself up, just not in a mosque or in a chemists or on top of a duck

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: Right well if they’re going to blow themselves up in the wrong place, you’ve got to make sure you all blow up in the right place. She kisses him gently - tenderness rises during the following.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Sof, I can’t even get them to stir their tea without smashin a winder-

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: (soothing) What’s your heart say? A tiny beam in Omar's eyes. The moment is broken by a voi from the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD OOS
dialogues.text: God's in your heart dad! They look up startled. Mahmoud has entered silently. Omar stares at Mahmood lost to a dawning revelation. Mahmood thinks the stare means trouble.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Hey you. Come here.

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: Sorry I heard talking. Sophia extends a loving arm towards him - he approaches. looks at Omar because Mahmood has hit the nail on the hea Omar is struck & if he were moving at all he would be fai nodding. 69  50 51 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.text: Does he become a martyr eh dad?

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Dont you worry, cos even if he gets blown to bits, he’s going to die smiling.

dialogues.speaker: SOFIA
dialogues.text: He'll go straight to heaven.

dialogues.speaker: MAHMOOD
dialogues.text: Yeah, he’1ll be in heaven before his head hits the ceiling. Omar is now nodding in the smallest possible way. The boy right. Sofia knows it too. Loving family unity opening up like a flower in the sun. Omar smiles & nods. They all sm at each other - the perfect sweetness of family.

Then Man’s talking head describing how the dog was nearly hit as the head fe out of the tree. Omar double takes as he hears the Asian man’s head story.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR

dialogues.text: That was a head it was obviously a head.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Right, so I’ve just seen Matt right? - Matt is running the London marathon tomorrow - he’s doing it in costume - you know they run in costume? - well so can we - we can disguise the gear in there- and it’s perfect- we got live tv - prime targets - all London

dialogues.speaker: OMAR

dialogues.text: Coz i made a mistake. But You didn’t (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 74  56 57 4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 OMAR (cont'd) You listened to your heart and you did the right thing.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY

dialogues.speaker: OMAR

dialogues.text: Also - you cannot win an argument just by being right.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: No?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: No. No way.

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: I think maybe you can Barry?

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Who asked you fuckbrain? Beat - this decides it for Waj.

EXT STREET. OUTSIDE HOUSE. NIGHT - CONTINUOUS *k Northern Armed Officers start moving silently up street. INT. BARRY'S HOUSE - GYM. NIGHT. *k

dialogues.text: Bro, I swear kusum bro I may ask you to blow yourself up but I will never ask you to piss in your own mouth.

He thinks a moment, he's got to do this, slips behind a screen, emerges with clipboard & stethoscope, putting on white coat and strides straight towards her - interrupts the cop. During this Sofia holds back the five mad monkeys trying to leap out of her face.

Their costumes are half on. Omar is a Honey Monster, Waj sexy ostrich, Barry - still sulking - is a ninja turtle a Hassan has the upside down clown we saw matt struggling w There is an air of final purpose.

dialogues.text: Mujahid brothers

dialogues.text: Mijahid.

dialogues.text: Well ... it says er - 'It’s wrong Waj. Don't do it.'

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Er ...'we’re here, together, all strapped up, and it would be like, well pathetic to cop out now.'

dialogues.text: Right (thinking)

dialogues.text: 81  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09 OMAR (cont'd) This is Waj’s brain we're talking about - since when do we listen to Waj's brain (to Waj) sorry bro.

dialogues.text: His brain says do it - so his brain’s gotta be right!

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Feels like me brain brother.

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: Yeah OK this is what's happened (pauses to get his own head straight) ) What’s happened is Shaitan has confused you. He's swapped round your brain and your heart. So don't listen to what you think is your heart - cos that's actually your brain! It’s in disguise, as your heart. Right? And what you thought was your brain - that’s your heart. That’s actually your heart. Waj is practically hallucinating in bafflement.

dialogues.text: Er. My brain is my heart. (looks at his chest and to Omar again) Waj starts to latch on to something. Omar taps Waj's head

dialogues.speaker: WAT
dialogues.text: Heart.

dialogues.text: Okay. Yeah. Follow your heart. Waj gets it - flooded with relief - back on track. 82  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.text: (interrupting) Hey! Omar looks to where Hassan is pointing

dialogues.text: (friendly - to Hassan) You can't run in that can you?

dialogues.text: He just drew the short straw. it's still horribly uncertain the cop is buying this then 83  4 LIONS SCRIPT at 31.10.09

dialogues.speaker: PATROL POLICEMAN
dialogues.text: Red zone, it’s back down there, left, second left again, and there’s marshalls, they'll tell you where to park (thinks they're daft) You're gonna die in that gear lads!

dialogues.speaker: HASSAN
dialogues.text: Hhyeah! (irony not runny)

dialogues.text: It’s all for a good cause though. Have a good day officer!

dialogues.text: Well, Good luck. The officer leaves. They pretty much hold their breath as walks away. Then they turn towards the van. Hassan’s eyes bulge as he watches the cop leave. He's now about 50 yard away. Suddenly Hassan bursts towards the police cars.

dialogues.text: Bloody hell.

dialogues.speaker: BARRY
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: OMAR
dialogues.text: What the fuck’s he doing? Hassan pulls his head free of the costume & sticks his ha up. He's in a total panic.

dialogues.text: (suddenly pointing with both hands - locking Hassan down)

dialogues.text: No no no! I'm real! (anxiously adjusting the sense) But not any more!

dialogues.speaker: PATROL POLICEMAN
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.text: (shouting his head off) YES I HAVE BUT ITS NOT GOING OFF.
